mapper.insert: INSERT INTO V_CAN_REF (V_CAN_REF_ID, V_CAN_REF_DATE, V_CAN_REF_AMOUNT, V_CAN_REF_ACC_NUMBER, V_CAN_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, V_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_V_CAN_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO F_CAN_REF (F_CAN_REF_ID, F_CAN_REF_DATE, F_CAN_REF_AMOUNT, F_CAN_REF_ACC_NUMBER, F_CAN_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, F_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_F_CAN_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO U_V_CAN_REF (U_V_CAN_REF_ID, U_V_CAN_REF_DATE, U_V_CAN_REF_AMOUNT, U_V_CAN_REF_ACC_NUMBER, U_V_CAN_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, U_V_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_U_V_CAN_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO U_F_CAN_REF (U_F_CAN_REF_ID, U_F_CAN_REF_DATE, U_F_CAN_REF_AMOUNT, U_F_CAN_REF_ACC_NUMBER, U_F_CAN_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, U_F_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_U_F_CAN_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO V_NOS_REF (V_SIT_NOS_REF_ID, V_NOS_REF_DATE, V_NOS_REF_AMOUNT, V_NOS_REF_ACC_NUMBER, V_NOS_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, V_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_V_SIT_NOS_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO F_NOS_REF (F_NOS_REF_ID, F_NOS_REF_DATE, F_NOS_REF_AMOUNT, F_NOS_REF_ACC_NUMBER, F_NOS_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, F_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_F_NOS_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO U_V_NOS_REF (U_V_NOS_REF_ID, U_V_NOS_REF_DATE, U_V_NOS_REF_AMOUNT, U_V_NOS_REF_ACC_NUM, U_V_NOS_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, U_V_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_U_V_NOS_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})

INSERT INTO U_F_NOS_REF (U_F_NOS_REF_ID, U_F_NOS_REF_DATE, U_F_NOS_REF_AMOUNT, U_F_NOS_REF_ACC_NUM, U_F_NOS_REF_ACC_DEPOSITOR, BANK_ID, U_F_RES_ID) VALUES (SEQ_V_SIT_NOS_REF_ID.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{pay}, #{refAccNum}, #{refDepositor}, #{refBankId}, #{resId})
